description: When people are relying on you, you should rely on their trusted Work Medium Crew Socks. Perfect for taller work boots, each pair uses our Smartwool® 2 Degree fit system with arch and ankle support to help keep the sock in place. They also feature a safety toe design that puts additional cushioning and durability around the toe. So, no matter the task, this sock is up for it.
name: Smartwool Work Full Cushion Tall Crew Socks - Mens
